subject: Career
title: The Origin Story Framework
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Origin Story Framework.

hook.text: Steve Jobs: adopted kid in a garage. Oprah: poverty to media empire. Origin stories create connection.

buildup.text: Every strong brand has an origin story â€” a narrative that explains why you do what you do.

discovery.text: The framework: challenge you faced â†’ insight you gained â†’ mission it created â†’ where you are now.

twist.text: Your story doesn't need drama. 'I fell in love with data while solving a real problem' is compelling.

climax.text: An origin story makes you memorable. Facts inform; stories stick.

punchline.text: People remember stories. Lead with yours.

quiz.question: What's the purpose of a professional origin story?
options: To create connection and explain your mission
